Class BaseScaleBar

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.map.elt.BaseScaleBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, ScaleBar
public class BaseScaleBar
extends Object
implements ScaleBar

The class draws a scale bar on the given graphic contents.
